Text.Page:
The naga pirates stole my research journal. It contains information about our defenses, our numbers, our suppliesâ€”we must stop them before they learn enough to wipe us all out!

It would help to eliminate the {@LinkCreature:31#17#storm naga predators} and {@LinkCreature:31#16#ravagers} and retrieve the research journals they've stolen.
Many thanks. I can now complete my report. There's no need to speak of this...misstep to Commander Fraya, right?
That journal must be retrieved from the nagas.
